ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Peace be upon Nuh among all beings!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Peace on Noah among all men.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Peace be upon Noah among all the nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Peace be with Noah among all men in the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Peace be upon Nooh, among the entire people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Salam (peace!) be upon Nuh among the all creatures!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Peace and salutation to Nuh among the nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Peace be upon Noah among all beings!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Peace be unto Noah among the peoples!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Peace be upon Noah among all the peoples!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Peace be on Nuh among the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Peace and salutation to Noah among the nations!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Salamun (peace) be upon Nuh (Noah) (from Us) among the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists)!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Peace be upon Noah among all the worlds'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Peace be upon Noah among all people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Peace upon Noah among the worlds."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:79] ‘Peace, from Us, be to Noah among the worlds!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Peace be unto Noah) safety and happiness from Us unto Noah (among the peoples) of his time!
